Name: Fat Tire
Ingredients: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This flavourful, bittersweet fruity aperitivo won't be to everyone's taste but it's certainly to ours.
History: Discovered in San Francisco in 2006, hence the American spelling of 'tyre'.
Nutrition: One serving of Fat Tire contains 220 calories
